_comment: Message templates for quick responses. Variables: {name}, {date}, {time}, {topic}, {custom}

follow-up.name: Follow Up
follow-up.template: Hey {name}, wanted to follow up on {topic}. Any updates?
follow-up.description: Check in on a previous conversation

birthday.name: Birthday
birthday.template: Happy birthday {name}! Hope you have an amazing day! 🎂

thinking-of-you.name: Thinking of You
thinking-of-you.template: Hey {name}, been thinking about you. Hope everything's going well!

running-late.name: Running Late
running-late.template: Hey {name}, running about {time} late. Be there soon!

sorry.name: Apology
sorry.template: Hey {name}, I'm really sorry about {topic}. Can we talk?

reminder.name: Reminder
reminder.template: Hey {name}, just a friendly reminder about {topic} on {date}.
reminder.description: Remind about an event or task

thanks-for-time.name: Thanks for Your Time
thanks-for-time.template: Thanks for taking the time to meet today, {name}. I really enjoyed our conversation about {topic}.

good-morning.name: Good Morning
good-morning.template: Good morning {name}! Hope you have a great day!
